author: lehors
msg: added a bunch of additional targets for DOM Level 3 support

author: sandygao
msg: Particle derivation (restriction): derived: element; base: model group.
We need to create a fake model group for the element in this case, and the
min/maxOccurs values for such fake thing should be 1 and 1.

author: sandygao
msg: Registering the schema message formatter to the error reporter.
Otherwise the error messages won't be formatted correctly.

author: lehors
msg: continued Elena's changes to have a new build supporting DOMLevel 3 Core,
the default build no longer contains the DOM Level 3 Core extensions,
on the other hand a bunch of new targets are defined to build Xerces with it,
More may be added later on.

author: lehors
msg: DOM Level 3 interfaces, put in a different hierarchy to allow
building with this or the DOM Level 2 Core
